title: Get connected at Béhance
content:
Recently I’ve found a fantastic social network for creative professionals. I’ve got an account there and are looking for other people that would like to hook up with me there.

You can find me here:  
 [http://www.behance.net/Characters](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202055918/http:/www.behance.net/Characters "http://www.behance.net/Characters")
author: Characters
